title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields. Integration build 09/17. The text fields in the Info page of the Project Properties dialog look bad on all motif platforms. On motif platforms, these text fields have automatic borders, which make it look like they are user input targets. In addition, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds that make them stand out even worse.
OB: On motif platforms, the text fields in the Info page of the Project Properties dialog have automatic borders that make them look like user input targets. On Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Select a Project. 2. Right-click and choose Properties. 3. In the subsequent dialog, navigate to the Info page. 4. Observe the readonly fields (e.g. Path, Type) in the dialog.
